DOC.brief_summary: Transurethral resection bladder tumor ( TURB ) essential treatment bladder tumour . Direct electrical stimulation obturator nerve TURB procedures trigger inadvertent adductor muscle spasm , cause serious complication like bladder perforation . General anesthesia muscle relaxant TURB guarantee prevention adductor muscle spasm . Spinal anesthesia selective obturator nerve block ( ONB ) alternative anesthesia TURB , adductor spasm also induce incomplete ONB . Recently , ultrasound guidance nerve stimulator use enhance safety , efficacy shorten onset time ONB . Some paper describe comparable ONB do use ultrasound without nerve stimulator , principle obturator nerve run along give pathway . Basically , obturator nerve divide two branch exit obturator canal . The anterior branch locate fascial plane among adductor longus , adductor brevis pectineus muscle , posterior branch locate adductor brevis adductor magnus muscle inguinal area . But known many branching pattern obturator nerve high anatomic variability inguinal area cadaver study . And subdivision obturator nerve inguinal area describe . Therefore , study conduct investigate success rate ultrasound-guided obturator nerve block interfascial injection approach group ( US-IFI ; experimental group ) comparable ultrasound-guided obturator nerve block nerve stimulate approach group ( US-NS ; control group ) TURB spinal anesthesia . And also evaluate adductor muscle twitch pattern inguinal region ONB perform .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Nerve Stimulating Approach Interfascial Injection Approach During Sono-guided Obturator Nerve Block
DOC.detailed_description: After obtain approval Gachon Gil Hospital Ethical Committee , write informed consent obtain patient anticipate TURB American Society Anesthesiologists physical status ( ASA ) I II . Sixty two patient anticipate transurethral resection bladder tumor ( TURB ) spinal anesthesia enrol randomize control trial December 2014 May 2015 . Exclusion criterion include patient diabetes peripheral neuropathy ; motor sensory deficit low extremity , ASA great III , coagulation disorder , anticoagulant medication , know allergy local anesthetic , contraindication spinal anesthesia ( infection injection site , severe scoliosis fusion operation ) , uncooperative patient patient ' refusal . Routine monitoring begin Spinal anesthesia hyperbaric 0.5 % bupivacaine 12-15 mg perform reach level anesthesia , least T10 T4 patient . Whether right left ONB do , decide surgeon accord tumor location . If obturator block do side , let belong group , count two , number . Patients position supine , affected leg slightly abduct rotate externally without knee flexion , inguinal region prepare povidone iodine solution . The 10 MHz linear probe ( Zonare Medical Systems , California , USA ) equip sterile plastic cover gel . The transducer position parallel inguinal crease 90° skin image depth 4-5 cm . The inguinal region examine laterally femoral vein 3 muscle layer consist adductor longus , adductor brevis , adductor magnus identify pectineus muscle medially along inguinal crease . We allow transducer tilt cranially 0°-20° angle fascial plane pectineus adductor muscle identify . A thick hyperechoic fascia use target landmark ONB , focus obturator nerve ( One adductor longus adductor brevis muscle anterior branch , another adductor brevis adductor magnus muscle posterior branch obturator nerve ) . We exclude case , three muscle layer identify definitely within range . In US-NS group , 22-gauge , 120-mm stimulating needle ( Stimuplex insulate needle ; D Plus B. Braun , Melsungen , Germany ) attach nerve stimulator ( Stimuplex HNS12 ; B. If adductor muscle twitch observe sonogram even stimulation current 0.3mA , 10mL local anesthetic ( LA ; 1.5 % lidocaine + epi 1:200,000 ) slowly inject within muscle interface negative aspiration , result separation two muscle real-time visualization . If misdistribution LA spread ( eg , spread muscle tissue ) , needle redirect correct spread LA visualize . The needle withdrawn skin reinserted position needle tip posterior branch . The stimulation current start 0.5 mA . If adductor muscle twitch visualize sonogram even 0.3mA , another 5mL LA inject . After injection anterior posterior branch , stimulation current increase 1.0 mA , needle re-advanced like Fig 1d search residual muscle twitching . If muscle twitch observe , current decrease 0.5 mA , confirm muscle twitch sonogram current , 5ml LA inject . We write muscle twitching occur kind muscle fascias . In US-IFI group , 22-gauge , 120-mm stimulating needle ( Stimuplex insulate needle ; D Plus B. Braun , Melsungen , Germany ) without nerve stimulator advance via ultrasound in-plane approach lateral medical direction position needle tip anterior branch . After negative aspiration , 10mL LA slowly inject within muscle interface , result separation two muscle real-time visualization . The needle withdrawn skin reinserted position needle tip posterior branch , another 5mL LA inject . After , needle withdrawn skin reinserted spot , attach nerve stimulator stimulation current 1.0 mA confirm block anterior posterior branch . If adductor muscle twitch show sonogram , another 5mL LA inject , document 'fail ' . After , needle re-advanced like US-NS group search residual muscle twitch . It go process US-NS group , write muscle twitching occur kind muscle fascias . We use nerve stimulator confirm success fail ONB TURB surgery . Any needle redirection withdraw skin , record additional needle pas . Before injection , image capture static , depth anterior posterior branch measure use built-in caliper ultrasound machine . We record ONB time , time start sonographic examination muscle layer identification include . All block perform one anesthesiologist 60 ONB experience . After perform ONB , patient position lithotomy position . Endoscopic resection neoplasm start use bipolar resectoscope ( electrical current : 280 W ) endovesical irrigation normal saline solution . The surgery perform six surgeon randomly . We request two assistant urology , n't know study group ( US-NS v US-IFI ) obturator reflex grading . Obturator reflex grade assess scale Lee 's paper . Gr I : movement palpable muscle twitching , Gr II : palpable muscle twitch without movement , Gr III : slight movement thigh interfere surgical procedure , Gr IV : vigorous movement interfere surgical procedure .
